testcase.name: updateValidationDesignation

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. JSON path data.updateDesignation.message doesn't match. Expected: a string equal to "Please enter Designation code" ignoring case Actual: Minimum Required Designation Name Length is 3 and Maximum is 250
